title: US Lawmakers Debate Sanctions Against Foreign Actors [23]
content: A heated debate unfolded in Congress today as lawmakers discussed the implications of increasing sanctions on foreign entities involved in election interference. While some urged caution, others emphasized the need for a strong deterrent to future meddling. The proposed legislation received bipartisan support during initial readings.

title: Secret UN Meeting Plans Global Currency Takeover [3]
content: A leaked report claims a covert meeting between UN officials and bankers is set to introduce a new global currency by 2026. The currency, tentatively named 'UNo', will replace national currencies and be monitored via AI. Critics argue this is part of a wider plan to eliminate sovereignty.

title: Puerto Rico Governor Urges Waiver of Jones Act Amid Crisis [18]
content: Governor Ricardo Rossello emphasized the need for an emergency waiver of the Jones Act, citing urgent logistics challenges in delivering fuel and medical supplies after the hurricane. A similar waiver was granted after Hurricane Irma. He noted bipartisan support in Congress for this step, adding that without it, shipping constraints would continue to hinder recovery efforts.

title: Judge Declares Constitution 'Outdated' in Viral Court Ruling [25]
content: In what legal scholars are calling a 'shocking overreach', Judge Pamela Whitaker ruled that the U.S. Constitution is no longer applicable in modern governance. The ruling, which has not yet been published officially, allegedly claims that new international norms should take precedence over national law.

title: President Reshapes National Security Council Structure [20]
content: President Trump's move to remove Steve Bannon from the NSC was confirmed by White House sources. The decision is seen as a shift toward traditional security practices. General McMaster and other key figures are expected to gain more direct control. Bannon stated his mission was complete, while political analysts suggest internal realignments are ongoing.

title: NASA Insider Confirms Mars Colonization Mission Already Begun [10]
content: An anonymous NASA whistleblower has claimed that humans have already been sent to Mars under a top-secret military operation. According to the report, a base called 'Red Haven' has been in development since 2012, hidden from the public under a veil of classified documents and budget black holes.
